name: NobNob's Harvest Heist
description:
NobNob's Harvest Heist

It's harvest day and NobNob has three hungry babies to feed. Luckily there's plenty of fresh vegetables waiting to be collected. Bring the right vegetables back to the den while avoiding the farmer's dogs and machines.

Controls:

  • W A S D or click and hold to move.

Tips:

  •   Keep yourself and your baskets away from the harvesting machines.
  •   The farmer's dogs are harmless but they will steal and eat your vegetables. Try luring them into the harvesters.
  •   Holding a vegetable you don't need? Feed it to one of the farmer's dogs.

Made for Ludum Dare 52: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/nobnobs-harvest-heist

Made in Godot. All art and audio was made from scratch during the jam.
